A bank charges $ \$6$ for a loan of $ \$120$.  The borrower receives $ \$114$ and repays the loan in $ 12$ installments of $ \$10$ a month.  The interest rate is approximately:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 5 \% \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 6 \% \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 7 \% \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 9\% \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 15 \%$
